tweets.text:
Fifty shades of brown on the #ThamesPath and in the river at Benson Lock this Winter Solstice afternoon.
#walkinwinter @RiverThames @RomneyWeir @EnvAgencySE @MariaHerlihyEA https://t.co/2CUh96VA6u
@EnvAgency Or simply...dont eat meatüôèüôè

For every one million turkeys we cook, around 250 tonnes of fats could be poured down the sink. 

Leftover cooking fats can harden in cold pipes and create blockages, increasing the risk of sewer flooding.  

Instead leave to cool, then scrape into the bin. https://t.co/x4S4yCfeUE

tweets.text:
I‚Äôve been on-site with @CanalRiverTrust overnight where the @EnvAgencyYNE are supporting #CRT in their response to a canal breach.

We‚Äôve deployed 3 x #EA mobile #HighVolumePumps as part of the multi-agency response and will be reviewing further tactical options today. https://t.co/YNTWy7kupc

Please don‚Äôt feed a festive #fatberg when cooking your #ChristmasDinner dinner this year!

Don‚Äôt pour fats, oils, grease down the sink as this can lead to a build up of #fatbergs, causing blockages & pollution.
 
Leave them to cool then scrape into the food waste or bin instead. https://t.co/C6irZdbKml

tweets.text: üíßüêüDid you know that small water bodies make up 80% of England's freshwaters and support over 70% of our freshwater species?! This Torridge headwater is lucky to have a farmer custodian making space for water and wildlife! Thanks to the @EnvAgency for its support! #TRRP #WEG https://t.co/CJMMqjHVHk

Heavy rain brings a high risk of surface water #flooding.

Stay safe and don‚Äôt walk or drive through flood water.

For guidance on #SurfaceWaterFlooding in your area, contact your local authority.

#PrepareActSurvive https://t.co/HDxT25SFg1

@pedrogers_peter @J1mboJet @EnvAgency @GeorgeMonbiot Hi Peter. I'm going to get in contact with our team at Chew Valley to see if there is anything we can do to help and I'll come back to you as soon as I can. Would you mind sending me a DM with your email address to log this on our system? ^Melissa

@MarkAvery @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK @WCL_News @GreenAllianceUK @Natures_Voice @WildlifeTrusts @Buzz_dont_tweet @Love_plants @Feargal_Sharkey Thank you for highlighting this case. @NHDCLibDems are fighting to rescue our chalkstreams incl the Ivel - Affinity know they can't keep sucking the life out of our rivers. Time to invest in reservoirs?https://t.co/Fn5KyC97UH

#Perch have a distinctive silhouette with a multi-spined dorsal fin & striking bar markings. These widespread fish hunt midwater amongst vegetation. They use their camouflage & agility to ambush invertebrates & small fish. #FishOfTheSevern
Read more: https://t.co/RYOrRLKczm
@stuartpengs @AbiReader @NatResWales @lesley4wrexham Here's another. Reported to @EnvAgencySW last year. 10m was moved. But bigger heap now next to roadside ditch. https://t.co/OSOBH590KN
@J1mboJet Same at Hollow Brook running into Chew Valley Lake in #NorthSomerset - maybe @BristolWater can take action? #soils #saveoursoils @EnvAgency @GeorgeMonbiot https://t.co/5X75aswgYu
@thetimes @Antipolluters Labour you say ? Surprised anyone ?

Good meeting with @EnvAgencyMids on Friday. Flood defence repair expected to begin in spring complete by summer 2021. Much needed and most welcome. Main attenuation scheme on track to start construction March 2022. Looking forward to ‚Äòshovel ready‚Äô! @RobertJenrick @JamesBevanEA

tweets.text: Exciting news! We've been awarded ¬£42K from @EnvAgencyYNE Riparian Tree Planting fund! 2.33km of new native hedge along Snape Clough, Meltham (14,000 hedge plants). Thanks Yorkshire EA team for their support! Partnering with  @treesponsibilit & @aireriverstrust #trees üå≥üå≥ https://t.co/IlzMeYJSnT

2020 has been a big year for our Trust. Together with our partner @EnvAgency we've been hard at work reconnecting 60km of the river through our #DNAire project. @EnvAgencyYNE @Suttle_Projects and @FishtekConsult have worked hard to be on course for delivering new four fish passes https://t.co/mlB9IcTWjs

We'd like to thank all the volunteer groups and partners along the river who've made it happen. We couldn't do it without people like @BradfordsBecks @AireCatchment  @WildTroutTrust and @BradfordCityAA https://t.co/q7BAdNnvbg

It‚Äôs safe to say a coracle floats! These were used along with canoes to collect litter from the River between 11-13 Jun 2019! Go to https://t.co/OX5l8dkYJ5 ‚Ä¶ to see how you can get involved! @ShropsWildlife @TheRiverSevern @EnvAgencyMids @30DaysWild @LYR_Shropshire

tweets.text: @daviddunninguk @EnvAgencyYNE @East_Riding @HumbersideFire @CanalRiverTrust @EnvAgency Thanks @daviddunninguk, When I read the article it read right, I didn‚Äôt know the headline doesn‚Äôt update. Learnt something today üëçüèΩ
